text: Except for their escort, Vittoria and Lucia might have been the only living creatures n an empty planet. After the initial shock,Vittoria felt calm. She knew exactly what she wanted, and was prepared to take it without scruple, if she could. What she had forgotten in her self-absorption in her own schemes was that other people were equally absorbed in their schemes, which were likely to run counter to her own.
